timeline.bodyText: You need to generate that file, see comment on top on how to do that

timeline.bodyText: Do they write anything about a license? This is somewhat problematic with images.
timeline.author: uhafner
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -179,3 +179,12 @@ Taken from https://hadolint.github.io/hadolint/img/cat_container.png and rescale
 Usage consent via Github comment at https://github.com/hadolint/hadolint/issues/449#issuecomment-658594755

+OT-Dockerlinter icons:
+
+The OT-Dockerlinter icon is referenced from https://github.com/opstree/OT-Dockerlinter/raw/main/static/ot-dockerlinter.svg
+No modification has been made only converted to PNG and resized

replies.bodyText: I am the maintainer of the OT-Dockerlinter repo, so I don't think there will be any license issue
replies.author: iamabhishek-dubey
